title: Karlach
tags: where to find karlach in bg3
how to romance karlach in bg3
content:
Agree to get the Boots for Gekh Coal Steal the Boots of Speed from Thulla

After freeing Nere, side with Brithvar and the rebels against him. Persuade the Deep Rothe to calm down so the Masters don't destroy her herd.

Events/Camp Events/Companion Events and Dialogue Act 1

Disapproves if you use Withers services to bring back anyone. Disapproves of attacking the owlbear. Disapproves booing Volo in the goblin camp. Disapproves of torturing Liam without Wyll (with hot poker). Disapproves of deman
